attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU are voting on a bill which will force internet service providers to stop people from downloading and uploading copyrighted material from the internet. We believe this will invade our privacy, and dispute the 'anyone, anything' nature of the internet.

rejection.details: The act of uploading or downloading copyright material is illegal.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
